item.description:
Hi Everyone,

If you want to join a group of people going to the Warren Miller Movie Wednesday 9PM Show then RSVP here. Tickets are on sale at the Portsmouth Music Hall Box Office or at Putnam's Ski Shop. Go to the Music Hall Link below if you want to order online or by phone.

We'll meet for dinner prior to the show at 7pm at Flatbread Pizza around the corner. See the link below for details and directions to the Music Hall

http://www.skinet.com...

Celebrating 60 Years of Warren Miller Films

Narrated by Jonny Moseley and presented in high definition, Dynasty showcases a blend of fresh cinematography and vintage clips from the past six decades of Warren Miller footage. Join us for a breathtaking global tour that will get you ready for winter, craving snow and wishing you were out there riding!

http://www.skinet.com...

Portsmouth Music Hall

Flatbread Pizza Web Site

Directions to Flatbread Pizza Company

Please be sure to purchase your tickets in advance as these shows almost always sell out.
item.name: Warren Miller Dynasty Skiing Movie at Portsmouth Music Hall
